@description.body:

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Cross browser XML Element API API to select, query and serialize XML elements. Further information:

  • MDN Parsing and Serializing XML Please note that nodes selected using the selectSingleNode() and selectNodes() methods remain in their document context so qx.xml.Element.selectNodes(foo, will search the entire document for any nodes named "bar", not just the foo node.

@type.name: @type
@type.body: {Boolean} true if the native XMLSerializer should be used, false otherwise.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The subtree rooted by the specified element or document is serialized to a string.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element | Document} The root of the subtree to be serialized. This could be any node, including a Document.
@param.description: The root of the subtree to be serialized. This could be any node, including a Document.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Selects the first XmlNode that matches the XPath expression.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element | Document} root element for the search

@param.name: @param
@param.body: query {String} XPath query

@param.name: @param
@param.body: namespaces {Map} optional map of prefixes and their namespace URIs
@param.description: optional map of prefixes and their namespace URIs

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Selects a list of nodes matching the XPath expression.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element | Document} root element for the search

@param.name: @param
@param.body: query {String} XPath query

@param.name: @param
@param.body: namespaces {Map} optional map of prefixes and their namespace URIs
@param.description: optional map of prefixes and their namespace URIs

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns a list of elements with the given tag name belonging to the given namespace (See MDN Reference).

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
element {Element | Document} the element from where the search should start.
       Note that only the descendants of this element are included in the search, not the node itself.
@param.description:
the element from where the search should start.
       Note that only the descendants of this element are included in the search, not the node itself.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
namespaceURI {var} is the namespace URI of elements to look for . For example, if you need to look
       for XHTML elements, use the XHTML namespace URI, <tt>http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml/</tt>.
@param.description:
is the namespace URI of elements to look for . For example, if you need to look
       for XHTML elements, use the XHTML namespace URI, <tt>http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml/</tt>.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: tagname {String} the tagname to look for

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Element[]} a list of found elements in the order they appear in the tree.
@return.description: a list of found elements in the order they appear in the tree.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Selects the first XmlNode that matches the XPath expression and returns the text content of the element

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element|Document} root element for the search

@param.name: @param
@param.body: query {String}  XPath query

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} the joined text content of the found element or null if not appropriate.
@return.description: the joined text content of the found element or null if not appropriate.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds or sets an attribute with the given namespace on a node

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
document {Document} The node's parent document, created e.g. by
 {@link qx.xml.Document#create}
@param.description:
The node's parent document, created e.g. by
 {@link qx.xml.Document#create}

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element} XML/DOM element to modify

@param.name: @param
@param.body: namespaceUri {String} Namespace URI

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} Attribute name

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {String} Attribute value

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the value of the attribute with the given namespace and name

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element} XML/DOM element to modify

@param.name: @param
@param.body: namespaceUri {String} Namespace URI

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} Attribute name

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} the value of the attribute, empty string if not found
@return.description: the value of the attribute, empty string if not found

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates an element with the given namespace and appends it to an existing element

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
document {Document} The node's parent document, created e.g. by
 {@link qx.xml.Document#create}
@param.description:
The node's parent document, created e.g. by
 {@link qx.xml.Document#create}

@param.name: @param
@param.body: parent {Element} The parent element for the new sub-element
@param.description: The parent element for the new sub-element

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} The new element's name

@param.name: @param
@param.body: namespaceUri {String} Namespace URI for the new element
@param.description: Namespace URI for the new element
